mapper.select: SELECT id, caption, is_posted, post_url, created_at, travel_plan_id, style_id FROM post_record WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_record (caption, is_posted, post_url, created_at, travel_plan_id, style_id) VALUES (#{caption}, #{isPosted}, #{postUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{travelPlanId}, #{styleId})
